item.title: Kubernetes The Easy Way
item.author: info@pepple.info (Ken Pepple)
item.description: Sometimes I don’t want to do things “the hard way” – I just need a testing environment. Kubernetes is one of those things when I’m developing applications. So when I needed a development cluster for my newest app, I wanted something fast, easy and without a lot of dependencies. Luckily, the latest releases of Kubernetes has made great strides in reducing the time between wanting a Kubernetes cluster and actually using a Kubernetes cluster – If you are on a public cloud, not OpenStack.
